title: Effective Collaborative Learning Strategies in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online tool proficiency and advanced-level language skills
context.additional_context: A course focused on solving group work challenges during online transitions for learners over 40, maximizing learning effectiveness by strengthening social interaction elements

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more effective communication strategies for collaborative learning in online environments.
Learners can improve group project task efficiency by 20% or more using digital tools.
Learners can apply a structured approach to resolve conflicts arising in online group work.
Learners can practically apply project management techniques for asynchronous collaboration, such as Kanban boards and milestone setting.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
